channel.title: ~~can some1 tell me how to get a npc to say stuff? plzz ~~
channel.description:
~~can some1 tell me how to get a npc to say stuff? plzz ~~ ~~can some1 tell me how to get a npc to say stuff? plzz ~~ ~~can some1 tell me how to get a npc to say stuff? plzz ~~

item.title: ~~can some1 tell me how to get a npc to say stuff? plzz ~~
item.dc:creator: @I_0ne_H1t_K0 I 0ne H1t K0
item.description:
@I_0ne_H1t_K0 wrote:

Go Into NpcHandler.Java And Search For if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;

Then Copy One Of Them And Paste One Under And Just Change The Codes

If You Need More Help Just PM Me Or Post Again And Ill Come Back And Check

if (npcs[i].npcType == #### << Npc ID Goes Here) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Easter Event! <<<< What You Want It To Say Here"; } }

Read full topic
item.source: ~~can some1 tell me how to get a npc to say stuff? plzz ~~
